name: tapokeeper
description: TapoKeeper - Monitor and control TP-Link Tapo Smart Plugs with real-time power tracking

scripts.build: npm run bundle && pkg dist/tapokeeper.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/tapokeeper.exe
scripts.build:all: npm run bundle && pkg dist/tapokeeper.cjs --targets node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-linux-x64 --output dist/tapokeeper
scripts.dist: echo Windows batch launcher available at tapokeeper.bat
